pull_request.title: [Feature] Create roles with icons
pull_request.body:
### Description
This pr allows devs to create guild roles with icons set.

### Changes
- Update `IGuild.CreateRoleAsync` methods

pull_request.title: [Features] Automod member profile moderation, new application fields, use clyde ai & guild invenory settings
pull_request.body:
### Description
This PR adds some new stuff discord has released.

### Changes
- [x] Add `UseClydeAI` permission [docs](https://github.com/discord/discord-api-docs/pull/6354)  
- [x] Add `GuildInventorySettings` [docs](https://github.com/discord/discord-api-docs/pull/6332)  
- [x] Add automod member profile moderation support [docs](https://github.com/discord/discord-api-docs/pull/6040)  
- [ ] Add new application fields [docs](https://github.com/discord/discord-api-docs/pull/6484)

pull_request.title: [Fix] Remove checks from `UpdateAsync` methods
pull_request.body:
### Description

This PR removes some some validations from message component/modal `UpdateAsync` methods. We can't rely on provided properties to check whether the message does actually have any content

### Changes
- remove message content validdations from message component/modal `UpdateAsync`

commits.message:
[Fix] Add missing parameters to `RespondWithModalAsync` methods and implement missing overloads (#2769)

* Added missing modifyModal parameters to RespondWithModalAsync methods

* Fix typo

* Remove unnecessary parts

* Add missing `options` parameter

* Add missing overload

* Use `.Invoke` with `null` check to simplify

* Remove code duplication

* Remove code duplication

* Add missing payload to `RestInteractionModuleBase`

pull_request.title: [Fix] Add missing parameters to `RespondWithModalAsync` methods and implement missing overloads
pull_request.body:
### Description
This PR adds missing implementation of modal modification in module bases.

### Changes
- Add missing `modifyModal` parameters to the `RespondWithModalAsync<T>` methods. (b7ee974)
- Add missing `RespondWithModalAsync<T>` overload to module bases. (e63665d)
- Fix inactive `options` parameter in the `RespondWithModalAsync` method. (46bcd72)
- Remove code duplication in `IDiscordInteractionExtensions` by using the `modalInfo.FromModal` method. (42f448b)
- Remove code duplication in `RestInteractionModuleBase` by extracting a `HandleInteractionAsync` method. (1a788d4)

pull_request.title: [Fix] Add missing parameters to `RespondWithModalAsync` methods and implement missing overloads
pull_request.body:
### Description
This PR adds missing implementation of modal modification in module bases.

### Changes
- Add missing `modifyModal` parameters to the `RespondWithModalAsync<T>` methods. (b7ee974)
- Add missing `RespondWithModalAsync<T>` overload to module bases. (e63665d)
- Fix inactive `options` parameter in the `RespondWithModalAsync` method. (46bcd72)
- Remove code duplication in `IDiscordInteractionExtensions` by using the `modalInfo.FromModal` method. (42f448b)
- Remove code duplication in `RestInteractionModuleBase` by extracting a `HandleInteractionAsync` method. (1a788d4)
